description:
Mo`s non-blood sister, gentle and kind, she followed her mother into Mo Fan`s family who married Mo Jia Xin. For certain reasons, left Mo Jia Xin shortly after marriage and abandoned Xin Xia.
Xin Xia is born with symptoms similar to muscular dystrophy in her legs. She cannot stand or walk for no more than a few steps. Her mother`s irresponsible actions did not stop Mo Fan from having a good relationship with her. In fact, he will become enraged if he hears anyone calls or imply that she is a crippled.
name: Ye Xin Xia
